description.para: Values for delivery member of xbee_frame_transmit_status_t.

briefdescription.para: XBee Transmit Delivery Status: Success [ZigBee, DigiMesh, Wi-Fi].
XBee Transmit Delivery Status: MAC ACK Failure [ZigBee].
XBee Transmit Delivery Status: CCA Failure [ZigBee].
XBee Transmit Delivery Status: LBT Failure [DigiMesh].
XBee Transmit Delivery Status: No Spectrum Available [DigiMesh].
XBee Transmit Delivery Status: Transmission purged; stack not ready [Wi-Fi].
XBee Transmit Delivery Status: Physical error with transceiver [Wi-Fi].
XBee Transmit Delivery Status: Invalid Destination Endpoint [ZigBee, DigiMesh].
XBee Transmit Delivery Status: No Buffers [Smart Energy].
XBee Transmit Delivery Status: Network ACK Failure [ZigBee, DigiMesh, Wi-Fi].
XBee Transmit Delivery Status: Not Joined to Network [ZigBee].
XBee Transmit Delivery Status: Self-addressed [ZigBee].
XBee Transmit Delivery Status: Address Not Found [ZigBee].
XBee Transmit Delivery Status: Route Not Found [ZigBee, DigiMesh].
XBee Transmit Delivery Status: Relay of Broadcast not heard [ZigBee].
XBee Transmit Delivery Status: Invalid Binding Table Index [ZigBee].
XBee Transmit Delivery Status: Invalid Endpoint [ZigBee].
XBee Transmit Delivery Status: Attempted Broadcast with APS encryption [Smart Energy].
XBee Transmit Delivery Status: Attempted Unicast with APS encryption but EE=0 [Smart Energy].
XBee Transmit Delivery Status: Resource error (lack of buffers, timers, etc.) [ZigBee, Wi-Fi].
XBee Transmit Delivery Status: Data payload too large [ZigBee, Wi-Fi].
XBee Transmit Delivery Status: Indirect message unrequested [ZigBee].
XBee Transmit Delivery Status: Failure creating client socket [Wi-Fi].
XBee Transmit Delivery Status: Key not authorized [Smart Energy].

description.para: Values for discovery member of xbee_frame_transmit_status_t.

briefdescription.para: XBee Transmit Discovery Status: No Discovery Overhead [ZigBee, DigiMesh].
XBee Transmit Discovery Status: Address Discovery [ZigBee].
XBee Transmit Discovery Status: Route Discovery [ZigBee, DigiMesh].
XBee Transmit Discovery Status: Extended Timeout Discovery [ZigBee].
XBee Transmit Option: Disable ACK [ZigBee and DigiMesh].
XBee Transmit Option: Disable Route Discovery [DigiMesh].
XBee Transmit Option: Enable Unicast NACK messages [DigiMesh].
XBee Transmit Option: Enable Unicast Trace Route messages [DigiMesh].
XBee Transmit Option: Enable APS encryption (if EE=1) [ZigBee].
XBee Transmit Option: Use extended timeout for this destination. [ZigBee].
XBee Transmit Option: Point-Multipoint [DigiMesh].
XBee Transmit Option: Repeater mode (directed broadcast) [DigiMesh].
XBee Transmit Option: DigiMesh (not available on 10k product) [DigiMesh].
Add this macro to the list of XBee frame handlers to have transmit status frames dumped to STDOUT.
Format of XBee API frame type 0x90 (XBEE_FRAME_RECEIVE); received from XBee by host.
bitfield, see XBEE_RX_OPT_xxx macros
multi-byte payload
set to 0 for maximum hop value
Format of XBee API frame type 0x91 (XBEE_FRAME_RECEIVE_EXPLICIT); received from XBee by host.
Format of XBee API frame type 0x10 (XBEE_FRAME_TRANSMIT); sent from host to XBee.

detaileddescription.para: Note that the network stack does not include a function for sending this frame type use an explicit transmit frame instead (type 0x11) with WPAN_ENDPOINT_DIGI_DATA as the source and destination endpoint, DIGI_CLUST_SERIAL as the cluster ID and WPAN_PROFILE_DIGI as the profile ID. Or, use the xbee_transparent_serial() function from xbee_transparent_serial.c to fill in those fields and send the data. XBEE_FRAME_TRANSMIT (0x10)

briefdescription.para: Format of XBee API frame type 0x11 (XBEE_FRAME_TRANSMIT_EXPLICIT); sent from host to XBee.
Configure xbee_dev_t for APS-layer (endpoint/cluster) networking.

detaileddescription.para: If using this layer, be sure to call wpan_tick (instead of xbee_dev_tick) so it can manage the APS layers of the network stack.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to an endpoint table to use with device

memberdef.argsstring: (xbee_dev_t *xbee, const void FAR *raw, uint16_t length, void FAR *context)
memberdef.name: _xbee_handle_receive_explicit

briefdescription.para: Process XBee "Receive Explicit" frames (type 0x91) and hand off to wpan_envelope_dispatch() for further processing.

detaileddescription.para: Please view the function help for xbee_frame_handler_fn() for details on this function's parameters and possible return values.

memberdef.argsstring: (xbee_dev_t *xbee, const void FAR *frame, uint16_t length, void FAR *context)
memberdef.name: _xbee_handle_transmit_status

internal.para:
Dummy frame handler for 0x8B (XBEE_FRAME_TRANSMIT_STATUS) frames. Placeholder until we integrate processing of those frames into the stack.
xbee_frame_handler_fn() Todo
Figure out what needs to happen with these frames. Does atcmd layer need to pass errors down to callbacks? Registered endpoints? Tracked conversations?

memberdef.argsstring: (xbee_dev_t *xbee, const void FAR *frame, uint16_t length, void FAR *context)
memberdef.name: xbee_frame_dump_transmit_status

briefdescription.para: Frame handler for 0x8B (XBEE_FRAME_TRANSMIT_STATUS) frames dumps transmit status to STDOUT for debugging purposes.

detaileddescription.para: View the documentation of xbee_frame_handler_fn() for this function's parameters and return value.
